name: Auto: Slowing Water
description: After your opponent takes Electro-Charged DMG: Apply 4 Stormstream stacks to them. (After actions, they take Piercing DMG based on the number of stacks)
descriptionraw: After your opponent takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color> DMG: Apply 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C144]</color> stacks to them. (After actions, they take $[K5] based on the number of stacks)
descriptionreplaced: After your opponent takes {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color> DMG: Apply 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stormstream</color> stacks to them. (After actions, they take <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> based on the number of stacks)
